lack_of_consent.definition: Processing without valid, specific, informed consent.

inadequate_transparency.definition: Insufficient or misleading disclosure about data use.

excessive_data_collection.definition: Collecting more personal data than necessary.

purpose_limitation_breach.definition: Using data beyond the stated purpose.

inadequate_security.definition: Insufficient technical or organizational safeguards for data.

unlawful_processing.definition: Processing without a lawful basis under GDPR.

rights_violation.definition: Failure to honor data subject rights requests.

missing_dpia.definition: Required DPIA not performed or documented.

inadequate_dpo.definition: Missing or ineffective Data Protection Officer.

breach_notification_failure.definition: Failure to notify a data breach as required.

international_transfer_violation.definition: Unlawful transfer of data across borders.

profiling_without_safeguards.definition: Automated profiling or decisions without required safeguards.

special_category_violation.definition: Improper processing of special category data.

data_minimization_breach.definition: Data not minimized to what is necessary.

accuracy_violation.definition: Failure to keep personal data accurate and up to date.

accountability_breach.definition: Lack of governance evidence or accountability measures.

processor_contract_violation.definition: Missing or insufficient processor/controller contract terms.

cross_border_cooperation_failure.definition: Failure to cooperate with cross-border supervisory authorities.
